Package org.cyclops.integratedscripting.api.network

Interface IScriptingNetwork

All Known Implementing Classes:
ScriptingNetwork
public interface IScriptingNetwork
Capability for handling scripts inside a network.

      Indicate that the given disk is not contained in this network.

    • getDisks

      Set<Integer> getDisks()
      Returns:
      All disks contained in this network.

    • getScript

      @Nullable IScript getScript(int disk, Path path) throws org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.evaluate.EvaluationException
      Get the script by the given path in the given disk.
      Parameters:
      disk - A disk id.
      path - A script path.
      Returns:
      The script or null.
      Throws:
      org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.evaluate.EvaluationException

    • getVariable

      <V extends org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.evaluate.variable.IValue> org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.evaluate.variable.IVariable<V> getVariable(int disk, Path path, String member)
      Get a variable containing the value of the given script member. This variable can be cached and invalidated if the underlying script is modified.
      Type Parameters:
      V - The value type.
      Parameters:
      disk - A disk id.
      path - A script path.
      member - A script member name.
      Returns:
      A variable.
